userStories.story: As a user, I want to sign in with my user ID and password, so that I can access the CardDemo application
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering user ID and password
userStories.expectedBehavior: System validates credentials against USRSEC file and navigates to main menu (COMEN01C) for regular users or admin menu (COADM01C) for admin users

userStories.story: As a user, I want to clear the sign-on form, so that I can re-enter my credentials
userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all input fields and redisplays empty sign-on screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to see an error message when I enter invalid credentials, so that I know my login failed
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key with incorrect user ID or password
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays error message 'Invalid User ID or Password' and allows retry

userStories.story: As a regular user, I want to view the main menu options, so that I can navigate to different application functions
userStories.trigger: Enter CMEN transaction ID or navigate from sign-on screen
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays main menu with options: 1-Account, 2-Credit Card, 3-Bill Pay, 4-Transaction, 5-Report

userStories.story: As a regular user, I want to select a menu option by entering its number, so that I can access that function
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering menu option number (1-5)
userStories.expectedBehavior: System transfers control to selected program: Option 1->COACTVWC, 2->COCRDLIC, 3->COBIL00C, 4->COTRN00C, 5->CORPT00C
validationStates: Please enter a valid option number

userStories.story: As a regular user, I want to sign off from the main menu, so that I can exit the application
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to sign-on screen (COSGN00C)

userStories.story: As a regular user, I want to see an error for invalid menu selections, so that I know to enter a valid option
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key with invalid option number
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays error message 'Please enter a valid option number...' and stays on menu
validationStates: Please enter a valid option number

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to view the admin menu options, so that I can access administrative functions
userStories.trigger: Navigate from sign-on screen after admin login
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays admin menu with user management options dynamically built from COADM02Y configuration

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to select an admin menu option, so that I can perform administrative tasks
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering menu option number
userStories.expectedBehavior: System transfers control to selected admin program based on CDEMO-ADMIN-OPT-PGMNAME configuration
validationStates: Please enter a valid option number

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to sign off from the admin menu, so that I can exit the application
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to sign-on screen (COSGN00C)

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to see a message when a menu option is not installed, so that I know the feature is unavailable
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key for an option marked as DUMMY or not found
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays message 'This option is not installed' and stays on menu

userStories.story: As a user, I want to search for an account by account number, so that I can view its details
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering account number
userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves account data from ACCTDAT and customer data from CUSTDAT, displays account balance, customer name, address, phone, SSN, credit score, and associated cards
validationStates: Acct Num can NOT be empty
Acct Num must be 11 digits long

userStories.story: As a user, I want to return to the main menu from account view, so that I can access other functions
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to calling program (usually COMEN01C main menu)

userStories.story: As a user, I want to clear the account view screen, so that I can search for a different account
userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all fields and redisplays empty account view screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to view card details from the account view, so that I can see information about a specific card
userStories.trigger: Enter a card number selection and press PF5 key
userStories.expectedBehavior: System transfers to card update screen (COCRDUPC) with selected card number
validationStates: Card number selection must be valid

userStories.story: As a user, I want to update account information from the account view, so that I can modify account details
userStories.expectedBehavior: System transfers to account update screen (COACTUPC) with current account number

userStories.story: As a user, I want to retrieve account information for update, so that I can modify account details
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering account ID
userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves account data from ACCTDAT and customer data from CUSTDAT, displays editable fields for customer information

userStories.story: As a user, I want to update account information, so that I can keep customer data current
userStories.trigger: Press PF5 key after modifying account fields
userStories.expectedBehavior: System validates all modified fields and updates ACCTDAT and CUSTDAT files with new information
validationStates: Zip Code is required (5 or 9 digits)

userStories.story: As a user, I want to cancel account updates, so that I can discard changes without saving
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to previous screen without saving changes

userStories.story: As a user, I want to clear the account update form, so that I can start over with a different account
userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all input fields and redisplays empty account update screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to view a paginated list of credit cards for an account, so that I can see all cards associated with the account
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering account number
userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves and displays up to 10 credit cards from CARDXREF file with card numbers, names, expiration dates, and balances
validationStates: Account Num can NOT be empty
Acct Num must be 11 digits long

userStories.story: As a user, I want to navigate to the next page of cards, so that I can view more cards when more than 10 exist
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays next page of up to 10 credit cards

userStories.story: As a user, I want to navigate to the previous page of cards, so that I can view earlier cards in the list
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays previous page of up to 10 credit cards

userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to calling program (usually COMEN01C main menu)

userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all fields and redisplays empty card list screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to select a card from the list for detailed view, so that I can see or modify card information
userStories.trigger: Enter card selection number and press PF5 key
userStories.expectedBehavior: System transfers to card update screen (COCRDUPC) with selected card number

userStories.story: As a user, I want to view credit card details by entering account and card number, so that I can see specific card information
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering account number and card number
userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves card data from CARDDAT and displays cardholder name, card status (active Y/N), and expiration date
validationStates: Account number must be a non zero 11 digit number
Card number if supplied must be a 16 digit number
Card not found for account and card combination

userStories.story: As a user, I want to return to the previous screen from card detail view, so that I can navigate back
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to calling program (card list or main menu)

userStories.story: As a user, I want to see the card details when navigating from card list, so that I can view details of a selected card
userStories.trigger: Navigate from credit card list screen (COCRDLIC) with selected card
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays card details with account and card number fields protected, showing cardholder name, status, and expiration

userStories.story: As a user, I want to retrieve credit card details for viewing or update, so that I can see or modify card information
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering card number
userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves card data from CARDDAT and displays card number, cardholder name, CVV, expiration date, and account ID

userStories.story: As a user, I want to update credit card information, so that I can modify card details
userStories.trigger: Press PF5 key after modifying card fields
userStories.expectedBehavior: System validates modified fields and updates CARDDAT file with new card information
validationStates: Expiration Date must be in MM/YY format
Expiration Date must be valid and not expired

userStories.story: As a user, I want to cancel credit card updates, so that I can discard changes without saving
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to previous screen without saving changes

userStories.story: As a user, I want to clear the card update form, so that I can start over with a different card
userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all input fields and redisplays empty card update screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to search for transactions by card number, so that I can view transaction history for a specific card
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering card number
userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves and displays up to 10 transactions from TRANSACT file with transaction IDs, dates, descriptions, amounts, and merchant information
validationStates: Card Num can NOT be empty
Card Num must be 16 digits long

userStories.story: As a user, I want to navigate to the next page of transactions, so that I can view more transactions when more than 10 exist
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays next page of up to 10 transactions

userStories.story: As a user, I want to navigate to the previous page of transactions, so that I can view earlier transactions in the list
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays previous page of up to 10 transactions

userStories.story: As a user, I want to return to the main menu from transaction list, so that I can access other functions
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to calling program (usually COMEN01C main menu)

userStories.story: As a user, I want to clear the transaction list screen, so that I can search for transactions on a different card
userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all fields and redisplays empty transaction list screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to select a transaction from the list for detailed view, so that I can see complete transaction information
userStories.trigger: Enter transaction selection number and press PF5 key
userStories.expectedBehavior: System transfers to transaction view screen (COTRN01C) with selected transaction ID

userStories.story: As a user, I want to add a new transaction from the transaction list, so that I can record a new transaction
userStories.expectedBehavior: System transfers to add transaction screen (COTRN02C)

userStories.story: As a user, I want to view detailed information for a specific transaction, so that I can see all transaction details
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering transaction ID
userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves and displays complete transaction details from TRANSACT file including ID, card number, type, category, source, amount, merchant information, and timestamps
validationStates: Tran ID can NOT be empty

userStories.story: As a user, I want to return to transaction list from transaction detail, so that I can view other transactions
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to calling program (usually COTRN00C transaction list)

userStories.story: As a user, I want to clear the transaction detail screen, so that I can view a different transaction
userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all fields and redisplays empty transaction detail screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to return to transaction list using PF5 key, so that I have an alternate way to go back

userStories.story: As a user, I want to add a new transaction, so that I can record a new purchase or payment
userStories.trigger: Press ENTER key after entering transaction details

validationStates: Transaction Type Code is required (2 characters)
Transaction Category Code is required (4 digits)
Transaction Amount is required and must be numeric

userStories.story: As a user, I want to cancel adding a new transaction, so that I can discard the entry without saving
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to previous screen without saving transaction

userStories.story: As a user, I want to clear the add transaction form, so that I can start over with new transaction details
userStories.expectedBehavior: System clears all input fields and redisplays empty add transaction screen

userStories.story: As a user, I want to copy data from the last transaction, so that I can quickly add similar transactions
userStories.expectedBehavior: System copies field values from the most recently added transaction into the current form

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to view a paginated list of all users, so that I can see all user accounts in the system

userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves and displays up to 10 users from USRSEC file with user IDs, first names, last names, and user types

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to search for users by user ID prefix, so that I can filter the user list

userStories.expectedBehavior: System retrieves and displays users matching the search criteria from USRSEC file
validationStates: User ID search must be alphanumeric

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to navigate to the next page of users, so that I can view more users when more than 10 exist
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays next page of up to 10 users

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to navigate to the previous page of users, so that I can view earlier users in the list
userStories.expectedBehavior: System displays previous page of up to 10 users

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to return to admin menu from user list, so that I can access other admin functions
userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to admin menu (COADM01C)

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to add a new user account, so that I can grant system access to new users

userStories.expectedBehavior: System returns to user list screen (COUSR00C) without saving

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to update user information, so that I can modify user account details

userStories.expectedBehavior: System validates modified fields and updates USRSEC file with new user information

userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to save and return to admin menu after updating, so that I can save changes and continue with other tasks

userStories.expectedBehavior: System saves user changes to USRSEC and returns to admin menu (COADM01C)
